Greek Meatballs

beef
mediterranean

Ingredients

  • 1lb ground beef
  • 1/2 Yellow onion (grated)
  • 4 cloves garlic (minced)
  • 1/2 cup panko bread crumbs
  • 1/4 cup milk (or yogurt thinned to milk like consistency)
  • 1 egg
  • 1 tsp dried oregano
  • 1 tsp ground cumin
  • 1 tsp ground corriander
  • 1/2 tsp smoked paprika
  • 1/8 tsp cinnamon

Procedure

Make the Meatballs

  1. mix panko and milk and let sit to absorb all the liquid
  2. grate onion and pat with paper towel to soak up some moisture (so meat mixture is not too soggy)
  3. combine onion, garlic, and spices with the soaked bread crumbs
  4. add meat and egg to mixture and combine. Do not overwork the meat!

Cook the Meatballs

  1. Heat cast iron pan over medium high heat
  2. Roll meat into golfball sized balls
  3. Once the pan is hot, add the meatballs to the pan, working in a spiral
  4. As the meatballs brown, rotate them.
  5. Optionally finish the meatballs in the oven or the instant pot

Finish in the instant pot

  1. Transfer the meatballs to the instant pot
  2. Use 1 cup of beef broth to deglaze the pan. Add this liquid to the instant pot.
  3. Pressure cook on high for 5 minutes
  4. Manually release the pressure
